Description:
Develop a competitive market price by comparing properties;
Determine the financial capabilities and needs of clients in order to recommend solutions that are tailored to their circumstances.
Engage in intermediate-level negotiations throughout lease processes, advising clients on market conditions, pricing, legal obligations, and other related matters to ensure ethical and equitable interactions.
Utilize intermediate-level negotiation skills during lease processes, guiding clients on market conditions, pricing, legal requirements, and other pertinent factors to guarantee transparent and equitable transactions.Skills
Skills:
Self-motivated, eager to learn, and a fast learner
Proactive in seeking out new learning opportunities, with a natural ability to pick up new skills and knowledge quickly.

Maintain current knowledge of real estate market trends and best practices.
